title: Mike Batt: The Very Best of Mike Batt (2002)
description:
2002 Limited Edition Reissue of the BritishSinger/Songwriter/Arranger/Producer's 1991 Best of-compilation.



Mike Batt

The Very Best of Mike Batt

Best of the Best: Gold

2002


 
  CD / 2002 / Bonus Tracks / VBR-V0

2. The Walls of the World

9. Journey to Badek 

10. Caravan Song

13. Portishead Radio

15. Love Makes You Crazy 

16. Whispering Fools
